channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Tropical Storms Drenched Mars for Millions of Years, Strange Pale Rocks Suggest
item.description: NASA's Perseverance rover found rocks on Mars that on Earth usually form in tropical environments.

item.title: Instagram CEO issues full-time return to office order
item.description: Instagram workers given a February 2026 deadline to return to the office five days per week.

item.title: Realme Buds Clip : des écouteurs à clip ouverts pour allier musique et conscience de l’environnement
item.description: La marque realme enrichit son catalogue audio avec les Buds Clip, ses premiers écouteurs à conception ouverte adoptant un design à clip inédit pour le fabricant mais déjà vu chez d’autres. En voici tous les détails.

item.title: Some of our favorite Cyber Monday deals are still kicking
item.description: Here’s a sad, yet predictable truth: most Black Friday and Cyber Monday deals are gone. But, not all of them have disappeared. In fact, some of the most popular deals, like the discounts on the Oura Ring 4, AirPods 4, and Nintendo Switch 2 are still sitting at their Cyber Monday prices. Although, given the […]

item.title: Mistral closes in on Big AI rivals with new open-weight frontier and small models
item.description: Mistral unveils its Mistral 3 lineup, including a frontier model and efficient small models designed for offline, customizable enterprise use—aiming to prove small, fine-tuned AI can beat closed-source giants.

item.title: Samsung’s Galaxy Z TriFold Is Launching in the U.S. in Just a Few Months
item.description: The 6.5-inch foldable phone, which is also a 10-inch tablet when unfolded, won't be cheap.

item.title: Cyber week sales are live – over 100 extended deals from Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, and more
item.description: Black Friday and Cyber Monday might be over, but Cyber Week lives on, and I have all the best deals still available from Amazon, Walmart, Best Buy, and more.

item.title: Titan OS raises $58 million from Highland Europe for its smart TV OS
item.description: Titan OS aims to expand its independent TV operating system in Europe and Latin America.

item.title: Why supply chains are the weakest link in today’s cyber defenses
item.description: Supply chain security remains one of the most fragile and underestimated aspects of cyber security.

item.title: Galaxy Tab A11 : déjà à petit prix, cette nouvelle tablette Samsung avec écran 90 Hz tombe à seulement 119 €
item.description: La Samsung Galaxy Tab A11 vient de sortir, mais cette tablette au design épuré et à l'écran bien fluide a déjà bénéficié de plusieurs promotions depuis. C'est d'ailleurs en ce moment que son prix est vraiment intéressant : sur Amazon, la version 64 Go peut vous revenir à 119,90 euros au lieu de 179,90 euros.

item.title: Apple AirTag, Galaxy SmartTag, Tile… quel porte-clé connecté choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: Les porte-clés connectés sont arrivés via Apple et Samsung. d'autres marques s'y sont ensuite mises. Découvrez les meilleurs trackers connectés pour ne plus rien perdre.

item.title: Streaming, IPTV, VPN : l’Arcom réclame le blocage automatisé et immédiat
item.description: Face à un manque à gagner colossal de 1,5 milliard d'euros, le régulateur juge ses outils actuels dépassés. Dans un rapport explosif remis à l'Assemblée, l'Arcom réclame l'automatisation des blocages pour le sport et s'attaque aux VPN.

item.title: It’s their job to keep AI from destroying everything
item.description: One night in May 2020, during the height of lockdown, Deep Ganguli was worried. Ganguli, then research director at the Stanford Institute for Human-Centered AI, had just been alerted to OpenAI's new paper on GPT-3, its latest large language model. This new AI model was potentially 10 times more advanced than any other of its […]

item.title: Free open-world RPG Where Winds Meet finally hits mobile next week after a successful PC and PS5 launch
item.description: Where Winds Meet launches on mobile next week after a successful PC and console debut.

item.title: The new paradigm: a concentration of data in AI demands greater vigilance
item.description: In the age of AI, the most dangerous gap for enterprises lies with data in use — the moment it is loaded into memory for processing.

item.title: Apple gadgets, ranked
item.description: Apple makes a lot of gadgets. Most of them are very good! You'd frankly be hard-pressed to find a company with a better track record, especially across so many categories. But only one Apple gadget can be the best Apple gadget, and it's time for us to decide which one it is. On this episode […]

item.title: Total car control, simplified! Get 30% off OBDeleven digital subscriptions
item.description: Get car diagnostic ready thanks to this Cyber Deal at OBDeleven

item.title: 5 tips from financial experts to finish 2025 strong
item.description: Christine Benz of Morningstar outlines key financial strategies. As 2025 winds down, here are some moves to help you finish the year strong financially. Morningstar’s director of personal finance and retirement planning, Christine Benz, discusses strategies.This interview has been edited for length and clarity.

item.title: The Perfect Holiday Gifts for Your Festive Fandom
item.description: 'Tis the season to be jolly, and you can get into the geeky spirit with these must-have gifts and decorations for the festive nerd in your life.

item.title: 30 practical smart home gifts that make everyday life a little easier
item.description: Smart home products are all about making everyday life a little easier, which is why they're some of the best and most thoughtful gifts you can give. Some people go all out building a multi-gadget IoT kingdom (like our resident smart home expert, Jen Pattison Tuohy), but a smart home is whatever your recipient wants […]

item.title: Metroid Prime 4 excels when it’s actually being Metroid
item.description: When Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is good, it's good. The latest in Nintendo's sci-fi exploration franchise, and the first since Metroid Dread in 2021, Beyond captures the moody sense of isolation and discovery that has been so core to Metroid since it debuted in 1986. Those quiet moments truly make you feel all alone on […]

item.title: How to watch Newcastle vs Tottenham: live streams, TV channels and preview for this Premier League encounter
item.description: We'll show you all the ways to watch Newcastle vs Tottenham in the Premier League from anywhere in the world.

item.title: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond was worth the wait – even if it occasionally gets lost in the desert
item.description: Metroid Prime 4: Beyond is a stunning visual treat on Switch 2, but how does it stack up against the series' best?

item.title: Backbone is launching a limited-edition Backbone Pro controller with a new transparent design just in time for the holidays
item.description: Backbone has announced that it will be releasing a limited-edition Backbone Pro controller in collaboration with Kith.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Wednesday, December 3 (game #906)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Wednesday, December 3 (game #640)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Wednesday, December 3 (game #1409)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: Mistral launches Mistral 3, a family of open models designed to run on laptops, drones, and edge devices
item.description: Mistral AI, Europe's most prominent artificial intelligence startup, is releasing its most ambitious product suite to date: a family of 10 open-source models designed to run everywhere from smartphones and autonomous drones to enterprise cloud systems, marking a major escalation in the company's challenge to both U.S. tech giants and surging Chinese competitors.The Mistral 3 family, launching today, includes a new flagship model called Mistral Large 3 and a suite of smaller "Ministral 3" models optimized for edge computing applications. All models will be released under the permissive Apache 2...

item.title: Apple pourrait faire face à d’autres procédures collectives en Europe, après cet arrêt de la cour européenne
item.description: La cour de justice de l'UE a estimé, dans un arrêt du mardi 2 décembre, que les utilisateurs de l'App Store néerlandais pouvaient bien intenter une action collective aux Pays-Bas pour réclamer une indemnisation due aux commissions d'Apple. Cet arrêt pourrait ouvrir la voie à d'autres procédures collectives initiées en Europe.

item.title: Some of the stuff we bought during Black Friday and Cyber Monday
item.description: It’s one thing to do a bit of online shopping during the Black Friday / Cyber Monday sales, but it’s another to put your money where your mouth is. (Where did that phrase come from, anyway?) If you’re curious what our writers, editors, and reviewers bought for themselves, here are some of the items, many of which […]

item.title: « Code rouge » chez ChatGPT : OpenAI changerait de stratégie à cause de Gemini
item.description: Alerte rouge chez OpenAI ! Face au succès de Gemini 3, la start-up aurait décidé de revoir sa stratégie. Plusieurs projets de taille auraient été suspendus de toute urgence. L’entreprise se concentrerait désormais sur l'amélioration de ChatGPT.

item.title: Apple will reportedly refuse India’s order to preinstall a government app
item.description: Apple is not planning to comply with an order from the Indian government directing phone manufacturers to preload a state-backed cybersecurity app, according to Reuters. Industry sources tell Reuters that Apple plans to tell India’s government that they don’t comply with requests like this due to privacy and security concerns. However, Apple won’t go to […]...

item.title: Wooting’s 60HE v2 is a solid upgrade to the best gaming keyboard
item.description: Over the past couple of years, I've tried to switch to many different gaming keyboards and always ended up back with a Wooting 60HE. Wooting changed PC gaming with the 60HE, popularizing the use of Hall effect switches and a Rapid Trigger system that speeds up how quickly you can activate keys. Now it's back […]

item.title: Xbox Game Pass en décembre 2025 : le plus grand aventurier et une flopée de pépites indés
item.description: Pour finir l'année 2025 en beauté, Microsoft déploie l'artillerie lourde dans le Xbox Game Pass. Entre l'arrivée très attendue d'Indiana Jones, le débarquement de Mortal Kombat 1 et une foule de pépites indés, le mois de décembre s'annonce très prometteur.

item.title: Sam Altman calls a ‘code red’ for ChatGPT – here’s what it will mean for you
item.description: Sam Altman is calling a "code red" on improving the ChatGPT experience for users, but will that be a good thing for you?

item.title: Sony A7 V vs Sony A7 IV: 5 key upgrades in Sony's latest full-frame all-rounder
item.description: They look largely the same, but with four years between the Sony A7V and Sony A7 IV, there are several upgrades in the latest model – I've highlighted the ones you need to know about.

item.title: MVNO : opérateurs, débits, avantages, prix… Tout savoir sur les opérateurs mobiles virtuels en 2025
item.description: Dans la guerre des prix des forfaits mobiles, le terme de MVNO ressort de temps en temps pour définir une certaine catégorie d'opérateur. Il se peut même que vous soyez abonné à un MVNO sans le savoir. De quoi s'agit-il ? Comment ça marche ? Combien ça coûte ? Toutes les réponses sont ici.

item.title: Amazon is testing 30-minute deliveries
item.description: Amazon is starting to test ultra-fast deliveries that aim to drop household goods at your doorstep in 30 minutes or less. The Amazon Now service is launching now in parts of Seattle and Philadelphia, according to Amazon’s announcement, allowing eligible customers to shop for items like fresh milk, eggs, produce, cosmetics, electronics, household essentials, over-the-counter […]...

item.title: Quels sont les meilleurs TV Oled en 2025 ?
item.description: La technologie Oled est reine pour parmi les téléviseurs haut de gamme, grâce à ses excellents contrastes et la profondeur de ses noirs. Nous avons sélectionné et rassemblé ici les meilleurs TV Oled que nous avons testés.

item.title: Costco is suing the U.S. government over Trump’s tariffs. Here’s why
item.description: Court records show Costco joined dozens of companies, including Ray-Ban, Kawasaki, and Revlon suing to safeguard potential refunds from Trump’s tariffs. Costco has sued the U.S. government to ensure it will receive refunds if the Supreme Court rejects President Donald Trump’s bid for sweeping authority to impose tariffs.

item.title: Cyber Monday is over, but the Nintendo Switch 2 is still a record low price
item.description: Pick up a Nintendo Switch 2 and a get free copy of Mario Kart World thanks to this huge discount at Walmart.

item.title: 4.3 million have installed this malicious browser extension on Chrome and Edge - here's how to check
item.description: After five years, browser extensions turned malicious, putting countless people at risk.

item.title: Voici comment One UI 8.5 veut en finir avec les applications pleines de pubs
item.description: La prochaine mise à jour de One UI s'attaque aux applis un peu trop chargées en publicités avec une option cachée, mais bien pratique.

item.title: Bose QC Ultra II : le meilleur casque audio du moment perd 50 € juste après le Black Friday
item.description: Après le Black Friday, on trouve encore de belles offres : comme cette promotion sur le récent Bose QuietComfort Ultra II qui passe de 449 euros à 399 euros chez plusieurs e-commerçants.

item.title: Sony Alpha 7 V : ce nouvel hybride plein format veut devenir le roi de la vitesse et de l’autofocus
item.description: Sony a présenté, ce mardi, son nouvel appareil photo hybride plein format, le Sony A7 V. S'il conserve la définition de son prédécesseur, il se veut plus rapide aussi bien en photo qu'en vidéo.

item.title: PS5 : sans le dire à personne, Sony a modifié un détail pourtant crucial de ses consoles
item.description: Les PlayStation 5 les plus récemment sorties d'usine profitent d'un changement très utile mais bien caché dans leurs entrailles : le passage à une nouvelle technique d'application de leur métal liquide. On vous explique en quoi c'est une très bonne nouvelle.

item.title: Google corrige 107 failles Android, dont 2 vulnérabilités exploitées dans des attaques
item.description: Google corrige plus de 100 failles identifiées dans le code d'Android. Parmi les brèches, on trouve deux vulnérabilités activement exploitées par des cybercriminels dans le cadre de cyberattaques.

item.title: I tested the new Sony A7 V, and now it's my favorite Sony camera ever
item.description: Bang on cue, the Sony A7 V has arrived and it blurs the lines between enthusiast and pro cameras forever

item.title: Scrubs brand Figs launches nonprofit to help ‘awesome human’ healthcare workers thrive
item.description: A new foundation set up by the company will support healthcare workers and students in a number of ways, including through direct financial assistance. To Trina Spear, cofounder and CEO of medical apparel brand Figs, change for the healthcare industry has to start with a focus on healthcare workers.

item.title: The First Reactions to ‘Avatar: Fire and Ash’ Are Flying In
item.description: The new James Cameron film starring Sam Worthington and Zoe Saldaña opens December 19.

item.title: Apple Music Replay 25 is more personal than ever
item.description: Apple has launched Apple Music Replay '25, a personalized look into your music listening habits this year.

item.title: Sony’s new A7 V uses a partially stacked sensor so you can shoot silently
item.description: Sony is announcing the A7 V, its first camera with a partially stacked sensor and various features borrowed from pricier Alpha models. It will be available body-only in late December for $2,899, and a kit including a new 28-70mm f/3.5-5.6 OSS II lens is coming in February. The A7 V is one of Sony’s most […]

item.title: Apple Music’s Replay 2025 is here
item.description: This year, Apple Music Replay includes even more listening habits, including the "Discovery" section, which highlights new artists users listened to, and "Loyalty," which spotlights artists that users have kept coming back to each year.

item.title: Ex-engineer blasts Microsoft – argues it must fix Windows 11 'until it doesn't suck', never mind about AI
item.description: Fed up with Microsoft's big push for AI? Wish it would fix the basic problems with Windows 11 instead? You are very much not alone.

item.title: YouTube Recap is a fascinating review of your year in videos – here’s how to find it
item.description: YouTube is joining in with the end-of-year summaries, and you should be able to find yours in your account now.

item.title: La R5 électrique franchit un cap symbolique et s’offre une fonction attendue de longue date
item.description: Ça y est, la Renault 5 E-Tech a franchi le cap du 100 000ᵉ exemplaire produit. À l'occasion de cette célébration, la marque annonce enfin l'arrivée du "one-pedal" sur sa petite voiture électrique en janvier 2026.

item.title: The Lenovo Idea Tab Pro is the best iPad alternative, and it's 33% off in this post-Black Friday deal
item.description: The Lenovo Idea Tab Pro is one of the best cheap tablets around, and it's currently 33% off in the post-Cyber Monday deals.

item.title: « Nous avons banni des tricheurs qui streamaient en direct » : l’anti-cheat de Battlefield 6 ne pardonne pas, voici les chiffres édifiants
item.description: EA fait le point sur son système d'anti-triche près de deux mois après le lancement de Battlefield 6. Et les chiffres sont très encourageants.
